welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Mendig, a charming city known for its rich history and stunning natural landscapes. We invite you to explore and immerse yourselves in our culture and breathtaking sights. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Spangdahlem Airport is a modern and efficient facility, offering a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Spangdahlem Airport serves as a hub for military personnel and their families, providing convenient access to bases and installations in the area.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access the internet.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt-Hahn Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Frankfurt-Hahn Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Limited to 60 minutes per user, additional time can be purchased.
